summary: Phase 32 implementation plan covering: Database schema additions (SipExtension, WhatsappSession, WhatsappMessage models), Backend call-center module (SIP extension + call record services), Backend WhatsApp Baileys service for QR-based connection, Frontend softphone component with JsSIP/WebRTC, Frontend WhatsApp QR connection UI. Existing calls/whatsapp/websocket modules are extended rather than replaced.
